short_summary: Work related to airborne topographic LiDAR data
description: Natural Resources Canada is seeking professional services for the acquisition, classification, and inspection of airborne topographic LiDAR data, as well as aerial orthophotography in support to LiDAR. Suppliers can qualify for four (4) work categories.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Contract Title and Details
### Contract Number
* NSN/Tender ID: NRCan-5000045352/E
* Contract/RFSA Number: NRCan-5000045352/E
* Amendment Number: 5
* Publication Date: 05 February 2024
* Tender Closing Date: 31 March 2040, 2:00 PM (EST)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 05 February 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: 31 March 2040

## Contract Description
Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites interested suppliers to submit a company registration form to become qualified for this request for a supply arrangement (RFSmA). This RFSmA is intended to establish a supply arrangement for prequalified suppliers to provide professional services for the acquisition, classification, and inspection of airborne topographic LiDAR data. Suppliers can be qualified for four (4) work categories, including:

* Land surveying
* Aerial photography services

## Request for Supply Arrangement
This RFSmA is open to all registered suppliers. NRCan is looking for suppliers who can provide professional services to acquire, classify, and inspect airborne topographic LiDAR data, as well as aerial orthophotos in support of LiDAR data. 

## Invitation to Pre-Qualify
Suppliers who are prequalified to an existing supply arrangement with NRCan under the RFSA #NRCan-5000045352, #NRCan-5000045352/A, #NRCan-5000045352/B, #NRCan-5000045352/C, or #NRCan-5000045352/D, do not need to submit a new arrangement.

## Registration and Application
To apply and be considered for this RFSmA, suppliers must submit a company registration form. Supplier registrations will be reviewed by NRCan for suitability for this RFSmA. Supplier's qualifications will be assessed based on the following factors:

* Business structure and organization
* Past performance
* Professional experience
* Product or service quality
* Integrity

To qualify, suppliers must have relevant skills, experience, and competencies required for this RFSmA.

## Contact Information
For any questions or inquiries, please contact:

* Marie-Josée Michaud
* Natural Resources Canada
* Email: [marie-josee.michaud@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:marie-josee.michaud@nrcan-rncan.gc
